article.title: Northrop to Provide GEN II Mission Computers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Guidance and Electronics Company, Incorporated, Woodland Hills, California, is being awarded an $8,880,685 firm-fixed-price delivery order against a previously issued basic ordering agreement for 52 GEN II mission computers for the H-1 upgrades Lot 9 production aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
